XAxiPcie Struct Reference

#include <xaxipcie.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

XAxiPcie_Config Config
u32 IsReady
u32 MaxNumOfBuses

Detailed Description

The XAxiPcie driver instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for every PCIe device in the system that will be using this API. A pointer to a variable of this type is passed to the driver API functions defined here.

Member Data Documentation

XAxiPcie_Config XAxiPcie::Config

Configuration data

u32 XAxiPcie::IsReady

Is IP been initialized and ready

u32 XAxiPcie::MaxNumOfBuses

If this is RC IP, Max Number of Buses
